expected: SET client_min_messages = 'warning'
SET SCHEMA 'addr_nsp'

query: CREATE SERVER addr_fserv FOREIGN DATA WRAPPER addr_fdw

expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY addr_ts_dict (template = simple)
CREATE TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION addr_ts_conf (copy = english)
CREATE TEXT SEARCH TEMPLATE addr_ts_temp (lexize = dsimple_lexize)

query: CREATE TEXT SEARCH PARSER addr_ts_prs (start = prsd_start, gettoken = prsd_nexttoken, end = prsd_end, lextypes = prsd_lextype)
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH PARSER addr_ts_prs (start = prsd_start, gettoken = prsd_nexttoken, "end" = prsd_end, lextypes = prsd_lextype)

query: CREATE TABLE addr_nsp.gentable ( a serial primary key CONSTRAINT a_chk CHECK (a > 0), b text DEFAULT 'hello' )
expected: CREATE TABLE addr_nsp.gentable (a serial PRIMARY KEY CONSTRAINT a_chk CHECK (a > 0), b TEXT DEFAULT 'hello')

query: CREATE TABLE addr_nsp.parttable ( a int PRIMARY KEY ) PARTITION BY RANGE (a)
expected: CREATE TABLE addr_nsp.parttable (a INT PRIMARY KEY) PARTITION BY range (a)

query: CREATE VIEW addr_nsp.genview AS SELECT * from addr_nsp.gentable
expected: CREATE VIEW addr_nsp.genview AS SELECT * FROM addr_nsp.gentable

query: CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW addr_nsp.genmatview AS SELECT * FROM addr_nsp.gentable

expected: CREATE TYPE addr_nsp.gencomptype AS (a INT)

query: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE addr_nsp.genftable (a int) SERVER addr_fserv
expected: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE addr_nsp.genftable (a INT) SERVER addr_fserv

query: CREATE AGGREGATE addr_nsp.genaggr(int4) (sfunc = int4pl, stype = int4)
expected: CREATE AGGREGATE addr_nsp.genaggr (INT) (sfunc = int4pl, stype = INT)

query: CREATE DOMAIN addr_nsp.gendomain AS int4 CONSTRAINT domconstr CHECK (value > 0)
expected: CREATE DOMAIN addr_nsp.gendomain AS INT CONSTRAINT domconstr CHECK (value > 0)

query: CREATE FUNCTION addr_nsp.trig() RETURNS TRIGGER LANGUAGE plpgsql AS $$ BEGIN END; $$
expected: CREATE FUNCTION addr_nsp.trig () RETURNS trigger LANGUAGE plpgsql AS $$ BEGIN END; $$

query: CREATE TRIGGER t BEFORE INSERT ON addr_nsp.gentable FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE addr_nsp.trig()
expected: CREATE TRIGGER t BEFORE INSERT ON addr_nsp.gentable FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION addr_nsp.trig()
CREATE POLICY genpol ON addr_nsp.gentable AS PERMISSIVE FOR all TO PUBLIC

query: CREATE PROCEDURE addr_nsp.proc(int4) LANGUAGE SQL AS $$ $$
expected: CREATE PROCEDURE addr_nsp.proc (INT) LANGUAGE sql AS $$ $$

query: CREATE SERVER "integer" FOREIGN DATA WRAPPER addr_fdw
expected: CREATE SERVER integer FOREIGN DATA WRAPPER addr_fdw

query: CREATE USER MAPPING FOR regress_addr_user SERVER "integer"
expected: CREATE USER MAPPING FOR regress_addr_user SERVER integer

query: ALTER DEFAULT PRIVILEGES FOR ROLE regress_addr_user IN SCHEMA public GRANT ALL ON TABLES TO regress_addr_user
expected: ALTER DEFAULT PRIVILEGES FOR ROLE regress_addr_user IN SCHEMA public GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON TABLES TO regress_addr_user

query: ALTER DEFAULT PRIVILEGES FOR ROLE regress_addr_user REVOKE DELETE ON TABLES FROM regress_addr_user
CREATE TRANSFORM FOR int LANGUAGE SQL ( FROM SQL WITH FUNCTION prsd_lextype(internal), TO SQL WITH FUNCTION int4recv(internal))
expected: CREATE TRANSFORM FOR INT LANGUAGE sql ( FROM SQL WITH FUNCTION prsd_lextype(internal), TO SQL WITH FUNCTION int4recv(internal) )

query: CREATE PUBLICATION addr_pub FOR TABLE addr_nsp.gentable
CREATE PUBLICATION addr_pub_schema FOR TABLES IN SCHEMA addr_nsp
CREATE SUBSCRIPTION regress_addr_sub CONNECTION '' PUBLICATION bar WITH (connect = false, slot_name = NONE)
expected: CREATE SUBSCRIPTION regress_addr_sub CONNECTION '' PUBLICATION bar WITH ( connect = false, slot_name = NONE )

query: CREATE STATISTICS addr_nsp.gentable_stat ON a, b FROM addr_nsp.gentable

DO $$ DECLARE objtype text; BEGIN FOR objtype IN VALUES ('toast table'), ('index column'), ('sequence column'), ('toast table column'), ('view column'), ('materialized view column') LOOP BEGIN PERFORM pg_get_object_address(objtype, '{one}', '{}'); EXCEPTION WHEN invalid_parameter_value THEN RAISE WARNING 'error for %: %', objtype, sqlerrm; END; END LOOP; END; $$;
expected: DO ' DECLARE objtype text; BEGIN FOR objtype IN VALUES (''toast table''), (''index column''), (''sequence column''), (''toast table column''), (''view column''), (''materialized view column'') LOOP BEGIN PERFORM pg_get_object_address(objtype, ''{one}'', ''{}''); EXCEPTION WHEN invalid_parameter_value THEN RAISE WARNING ''error for %: %'', objtype, sqlerrm; END; END LOOP; END; '

query: select * from pg_get_object_address('operator of access method', '{btree,integer_ops,1}', '{int4,bool}')
expected: SELECT * FROM pg_get_object_address('operator of access method', '{btree,integer_ops,1}', '{int4,bool}')

query: select * from pg_get_object_address('operator of access method', '{btree,integer_ops,99}', '{int4,int4}')
expected: SELECT * FROM pg_get_object_address('operator of access method', '{btree,integer_ops,99}', '{int4,int4}')

query: select * from pg_get_object_address('function of access method', '{btree,integer_ops,1}', '{int4,bool}')
expected: SELECT * FROM pg_get_object_address('function of access method', '{btree,integer_ops,1}', '{int4,bool}')

query: select * from pg_get_object_address('function of access method', '{btree,integer_ops,99}', '{int4,int4}')
expected: SELECT * FROM pg_get_object_address('function of access method', '{btree,integer_ops,99}', '{int4,int4}')

query: DO $$ DECLARE objtype text; names text[]; args text[]; BEGIN FOR objtype IN VALUES ('table'), ('index'), ('sequence'), ('view'), ('materialized view'), ('foreign table'), ('table column'), ('foreign table column'), ('aggregate'), ('function'), ('procedure'), ('type'), ('cast'), ('table constraint'), ('domain constraint'), ('conversion'), ('default value'), ('operator'), ('operator class'), ('operator family'), ('rule'), ('trigger'), ('text search parser'), ('text search dictionary'), ('text search template'), ('text search configuration'), ('policy'), ('user mapping'), ('default acl'), ('transform'), ('operator of access method'), ('function of access method'), ('publication namespace'), ('publication relation') LOOP FOR names IN VALUES ('{eins}'), ('{addr_nsp, zwei}'), ('{eins, zwei, drei}') LOOP FOR args IN VALUES ('{}'), ('{integer}') LOOP  BEGIN  PERFORM pg_get_object_address(objtype, names, args);  EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN  RAISE WARNING 'error for %,%,%: %', objtype, names, args, sqlerrm; END; END LOOP; END LOOP; END LOOP; END; $$;
expected: DO ' DECLARE objtype text; names text[]; args text[]; BEGIN FOR objtype IN VALUES (''table''), (''index''), (''sequence''), (''view''), (''materialized view''), (''foreign table''), (''table column''), (''foreign table column''), (''aggregate''), (''function''), (''procedure''), (''type''), (''cast''), (''table constraint''), (''domain constraint''), (''conversion''), (''default value''), (''operator''), (''operator class''), (''operator family''), (''rule''), (''trigger''), (''text search parser''), (''text search dictionary''), (''text search template''), (''text search configuration''), (''policy''), (''user mapping''), (''default acl''), (''transform''), (''operator of access method''), (''function of access method''), (''publication namespace''), (''publication relation'') LOOP FOR names IN VALUES (''{eins}''), (''{addr_nsp, zwei}''), (''{eins, zwei, drei}'') LOOP FOR args IN VALUES (''{}''), (''{integer}'') LOOP  BEGIN  PERFORM pg_get_object_address(objtype, names, args);  EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN  RAISE WARNING ''error for %,%,%: %'', objtype, names, args, sqlerrm; END; END LOOP; END LOOP; END LOOP; END; '

query: DROP FOREIGN DATA WRAPPER addr_fdw CASCADE

expected: DROP SUBSCRIPTION regress_addr_sub RESTRICT
DROP OWNED BY regress_addr_user RESTRICT
DROP ROLE regress_addr_user
